hero.title: Jai Maa Baglamukhi

aboutMaa.title: About Maa Baglamukhi
aboutMaa.para1: Maa Baglamukhi, also known as Pitambara Maa, is one of the ten Mahavidyas (wisdom goddesses) in Hinduism. She holds divine power to silence negative energies and bless her devotees with victory, stability, and peace.
aboutMaa.para2: The holy shrine at Nalkheda, Madhya Pradesh, draws thousands who seek divine blessings, protection from enemies, and fulfillment of their wishes.

historyMiracles.title: History & Miracles
historyMiracles.description: The holy temple of Maa Baglamukhi in Nalkheda, Madhya Pradesh, has been a powerful spiritual center for centuries. Known for its unique energy and sacred rituals, it attracts countless devotees, saints, and seekers.

card1.title: Victory in Legal Matters
card1.text: Many devotees have won tough court cases after doing Maa Baglamukhi‚Äôs anushthan.

card2.title: Protection from Negativity
card2.text: Her blessings have shielded people from evil energies, black magic, and jealousy.

card3.title: Divine Interventions
card3.text: People have experienced divine signs and fulfilled wishes after sincere prayers.

historyMiracles.finalNote: The temple holds special importance during Navratri, when powerful rituals like Baglamukhi Anushthan are performed for spiritual upliftment, peace, and prosperity.

location.heading: Location of Maa Baglamukhi Temple
location.description: Visit the divine temple located in Nalkheda, Madhya Pradesh.
